titles: The spiritual warfare, or, Some sermons concerning the nature of mortification, right exercise, and spiritual advantages thereof whereunto are added other two sermons, concerning the mystery of contentment : being the substance of ten sermons never heretofore printed / by Mr. Andrew Gray, late minister of the gospel at Glasgow.
author: Gray, Andrew, 1633-1656.
publisher: Printed by George Swinton, James Glen, and Thomas Brown,
notes: Imperfect: pages stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
